CoDAS (Conflux DeFi Agent Swarm) is an AI-powered DeFi automation system on Conflux
The swarm consists of 10 specialized AI agents working in coordination
Each agent has specific roles but can communicate with others through the Coordinator
All agents operate 24/7 to optimize DeFi operations and portfolio management
The system uses advanced AI to automate complex DeFi strategies
Conflux is a high-performance blockchain with Tree-Graph consensus
Conflux offers fast transactions and low fees

Conflux's ecosystem includes DeFi, NFTs, and Web3 applications

content.text: Identified: New DEX launching on Conflux with unique LP incentives, early staking program with 300% APY, upcoming NFT collection with strong utility. Analyzing tokenomics and team background now.
